colour.models.rgb.dataset.adobe_wide_gamut_rgb Module¶

Adobe Wide Gamut RGB Colourspace¶

Defines the Adobe Wide Gamut RGB colourspace:

  • ADOBE_WIDE_GAMUT_RGB_COLOURSPACE.

See also

RGB Colourspaces Jupyter Notebook

References

[1]Wikipedia. (n.d.). Wide-gamut RGB color space. Retrieved April 13, 2014, from http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wide-gamut_RGB_color_space
colour.models.rgb.dataset.adobe_wide_gamut_rgb.ADOBE_WIDE_GAMUT_RGB_PRIMARIES = array([[ 0.7347, 0.2653], [ 0.1152, 0.8264], [ 0.1566, 0.0177]])¶

Adobe Wide Gamut RGB colourspace primaries.

ADOBE_WIDE_GAMUT_RGB_PRIMARIES : ndarray, (3, 2)

colour.models.rgb.dataset.adobe_wide_gamut_rgb.ADOBE_WIDE_GAMUT_RGB_ILLUMINANT = 'D50'¶

Adobe Wide Gamut RGB colourspace whitepoint name as illuminant.

ADOBE_WIDE_GAMUT_RGB_ILLUMINANT : unicode

colour.models.rgb.dataset.adobe_wide_gamut_rgb.ADOBE_WIDE_GAMUT_RGB_WHITEPOINT = array([ 0.3457, 0.3585])¶

Adobe Wide Gamut RGB colourspace whitepoint.

ADOBE_WIDE_GAMUT_RGB_WHITEPOINT : ndarray
